Name: Escape to Mars
About the game: Escape To Mars A game with inspirations like Pac-Man, Escape To Mars is a game about Action, puzzle and abilites require good tempo of player. Controls: Using Arrows or W,A,S,D for movement. The movement DON'T HAVE a button to STOP movement. Your goal is collect all points on the level. Each level have 3 steps but only first level must be complete to pass for next level. Others steps is just for each player wanna to collect all stars. Story You are an alien in your uncontrolled ship that needs to return to Mars, where it is your homeland, as soon as possible to warn everyone of the invasion of the Cyclops that could cause the extinction of your civilization.
Meta Title: Escape to Mars: Aug 5, 2021, Ancarus and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Escape to Mars? Check out the release date (Aug 5, 2021), developer insights from Ancarus, and a complete game summary.
